website_summaries.verdict: An affordable scooter cover that fits well and is easy to use.
pros: Made of water-resistant polyester with an elastic bottom for a snug fit
Includes a storage bag and protects from UV rays
cons: Material is thin and can rip in inclement weather
This is best for protecting from sun and dust

customer_reviews.title: Fine for dust, bad for elements
customer_reviews.text: Put this cover over my scooter outdoors. It didn't make it one month. The materiel is thin and ripped easily - even under only rain and wind. By the end of winter, it was in shreads. If you're looking for a cover for outdoor use - this is not what you need.
customer_reviews.author: David Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in the sun
customer_reviews.text: After having this cover for almost a year, its become useless. Does not hold up to UV, what started as lines became cracks and huge parts have ripped open and now it tears whenever it touches anything. Note the horizontal fade in the first picture isn't a shadow, it's just that faded from being in the sun. Save your money, get something a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: About as durable as paper, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This cover fell apart. Do not buy this cover. Seller doesn't respond and the product is barely more durable than paper. This had good reviews, so I thought I'd try it but clearly people are being too generous or these are mostly fake reviews. Do not buy this cover. This cover is complete crap and is not waterproof, rain proof or anything. This is sold as a 4 season cover and it can't even handle one of the 4 seasons and the seller ignores all messages. I will be contacting Amazon about a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J Mott

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Using the words "waterproof" and "rain" in the title/description is misleading. I undersand that you get what you pay for, so while I wasn't expecting this cover to withstand hurricane level storms, I was however hoping that the cover would at least keep my scooter dry from dew. Nope. This is basically the same material as a tent, and as such if it comes in contact with any part of what it's covering then the material becomes flow-though. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: funleavy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had to use it a couple of times but it's come in plenty handy when I needed them to keep the rain off of my moped they definitely work well
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it alot till it ripped on me. I hope they send me anouther and ill gv a better review. But it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little smaller than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large because that's what I had in a before in a different brand and it fit perfectly fine. This one comes a lot smaller but I was still able to get it on my bike. It seems to be made from good material but one of the seams has started to come undone. Maybe do to the fact that it runs a lot smaller and I was having to pull it so tightly over my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Rodrigue

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to test it in all situations, yet, but I only wanted the cover to deflect direct sunlight. So far it works well. I'll do an update when the weather offers something different but I live in Phoenix Arizona so it could be a while! I'm using this on my 150cc scooter. A medium sized bike.
customer_reviews.author: Frak_U

customer_reviews.title: Good not great. Weak clip.
customer_reviews.text: The clip that attaches to the wheel broke during a storm and flew away. Ive seen the second hold in storms. It's cheap so you get what you pay for. UPDATE: this cover sucks. I've lost 3 from the wind. Invest in a heavy more rugged cover and you won't have to buy 3 (now 4) like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price of less than $20.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the price, wish it was a bit more durable but I do live in Kansas so hi winds are a regular problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shad Yoakum

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Tao Tao Lancer 150cc perfectly. I especially like the way it attaches around and hugs the front tire to keep it on when it's windy. Good product for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous by Choice

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on November 6, 2015 and 8 months later it's disintegrating. I know it's inexpensive but it didn't even last a year. They call it "Waterproof Rain UV Dust Prevention Dustproof Covering" so it meant to be used outside. I guess if you replace every 6 months you might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bobzinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover for the price. It is not a heavyweight cover, but rather light and thin. It fits my scooter well and is easy to put on and take off. It does let some moisture through, so you might see some condensation or moisture on the the scooter. But it does offer some degree of protection and is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: My bike stays in one place mostly and is under my deck, so weather conditions are not terrible. This works for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made and works great for my 50cc TaoTao scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Horrible outdoor cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover was great for about 2 months. After that it became so weak a light wind would tear it. Unless you are going to use as an indoor cover, just pass and spend a little bit more on a real cover.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Fazil

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: After an overnight rain storm, I came out to find my moped wet underneath the cover so it didn't work at all. Also, after a couple of months of use, the material has some small holes. Wish it was more durable and more waterproof like the description said...
customer_reviews.author: S. Zook

customer_reviews.title: AFTER I GOT IT WAS OK, THEN A FEW ...
customer_reviews.text: AFTER I GOT IT WAS OK,THEN A FEW DAY LATER I WAS TAKING IT OFF I FOUND THAT IT WAS NOT SEW ALL THE WAY UP RIGHT AND WAS COMING APART AND ITOOK IT AND HAD IT FIX THAT COST ME 15.00, SO MAKE SURE YOU LOOK TO SEE IF IT PUT TOGETHER RIGHT
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Nice scooter cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for my 49cc scooter. I use it year around and it has held up to wind and rain and snow here in the midwest.
customer_reviews.author: P. Toleikis

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but doesn't fit well around the ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but doesn't fit well around the front and back wheels so that it doesn't blow off and protects the entire bike. You kind of have to pick and choose which parts are most important to be covered (and the bike we are using it on is not large). It's basically a bag but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: fishinadish

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. The price is perfect and with the harsh sun destroying anything I put on my scooter pretty quickly, this cover holds up fairly well. I also like that it snaps together through the front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Holaday

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cover. Was super skeptical that it was going ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cover. Was super skeptical that it was going to worthwhile at that price. Works great, fits great. What a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: abc3702

customer_reviews.title: Tears. Cheap. [$surprise$]
customer_reviews.text: Split too easily and too soon. Even for the cheap price, to have it tear so quickly made it seem pretty cheap. It's back up to maybe 3 stars if you manage to diy a patch job.
customer_reviews.author: dbre

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This protected my scooter trough the whole winter from ice and the whole summe from sun
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: very nice love the elastic to keep it on our 50cc
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these, very nice love the elastic to keep it on our 50cc Scooters
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! NOT waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is advertised as waterproof but it definitely is not. The entire seat, tank, and handlebars were wet from a typical rain soaking right through the material. The cheapie cover we had worked better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after only 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 days and ripped. It's super thin and cheap. Came out on the morning after only 3 days on my bike. I park in a place that is shielded by most wind and it had still torn. Would not buy again. Pass on this and save your money
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tarp with great elastic around the edge. Not much more to it. The clip works. It doesn't fold that easily, but that's normal for this material. It's what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jankowiak

customer_reviews.title: Works For Sun, Hasn't rained yet, so don't know about water.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use on his scooter. He loves it. Hasn't rained here in Az. for a while so I do not know how it will do in water. What we have to contend with is the sun, and how it bakes everything, and ruins the clear coat, etc. This works on the scooter.
customer_reviews.author: David Dewey

customer_reviews.title: good and thin skinned. Fits under moped seat.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin but seems to do the job well. I live in humid Hawaii where it rains alot too. Will see how well it resists mildew soon. Will update if it molds quickly.
customer_reviews.author: sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Sewing or Unfortunate Dud?
customer_reviews.text: The clasp strap broke the first time I used it. I woke up to find that while the clasp was still locked, the strap connecting it to the cover had been torn away anf rended into some useless.(and unaesthetic) ornament---not particularly helpful in keeping my scooter covered!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for my toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Works great and gives us good protection from the elements.and was a good price for security.
customer_reviews.author: donald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Moped Cover
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for my moped. I use the clip to keep it tied to the front wheel. The elastic at both ends also makes sure everything is nice and snug once everything is covered. Its nice and waterproof. No issues at all to be spoken of.
customer_reviews.author: William Settle

customer_reviews.title: Its a great cover. Not perfect but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a great cover. Not perfect but worth the price. It does get wet under the rain. Easy to install and fit perfectly to a medium size scooter
customer_reviews.author: Mario J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. Spend a bit more and get higher quality.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is pretty low quality. It is extremely thin, and It has already got several tears. It's barely stronger than paper. I'm very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but invest in extra tie downs for windy days
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly around my moped. The buckle strap is a nice addition. I have bought two of these and lost both during sever storms. It just cannot hold during those gusty days. One way to solve this would be making grommet holes and using bungee cords to have extra tie down points. A back buckle would be great
customer_reviews.author: Hou Her

customer_reviews.title: It is waterproof
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had three rainstorms in the last couple months and my scooter remained dry throughout. I'm pretty satisfied with this product. I have gone thru two other different brands in the past and the common issue I found was that they eventually fade and thin out in the sun, despite claims of being UV rays resistant. They all eventually ripped on me.
customer_reviews.author: happycarrot

customer_reviews.title: Good for Me
customer_reviews.text: One frill - the clip that goes on the front tire. Otherwise no frills, is-what-it-is and does-what-it-says Scooter cover. Would probably cover a small motorcycle. Thin but I just need it covered, not tucked in for the night.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Walburnito

customer_reviews.title: Great moped cover
customer_reviews.text: Good moped cover for the price. Fits easily over my daughters new moped. Her moped has 14" tires and this hangs right to the ground. Works for keep dust and rain off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Our use it as a dustcover and that is fine but I have my doubts if it would protect ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover was lighter than I expected. It does not totally fit the scooter-a Honda Silverwing. Our use it as a dustcover and that is fine but I have my doubts if it would protect it much from the rain if the bike was outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful, blows away with the slightest breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This thing will not stay on and is not good quality. Return policy stinks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: cheap... last a few months and now looks like a rag
customer_reviews.author: adiaz

customer_reviews.title: For the price its good. If there are weather elements
customer_reviews.text: For the price its good. If there are weather elements, like wind you will probably get holes in stress points as I did. Duct tape!
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful1

customer_reviews.title: This thing lasted about 1. 5 months before it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted about 1.5 months before it ripped into pieces. I live in a very temperate climate, but apparently the limited amount of moisture and daily sun were too much for this cover. Cheaply made. Ripped at the seams at first then split down the middle in multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: Ali G

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't perform as described. It began to disintergrate when it got wet. I had to clean the inner material from my scooter after some rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive, works great, using it as I type this and all the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Trower

customer_reviews.title: Good cover fits well
customer_reviews.text: So for keeps my scooter drive but it is under a partial roof
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: It's good product
customer_reviews.text: It works good its water resistant it doesn't heat up with the motor and it's very durable it works
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this cover.
customer_reviews.text: Used this cover for my 2 bisycles. Got one for my brother. We both love it. Perfect siaze and full cover.
customer_reviews.author: Estrop Roysten

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine on my 2014 Zuma 125 with a trunk installed and a windshield. Seems a little thin but if it were any thicker it would be too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Wittwer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a light cover on my scooter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Great price for a light cover on my scooter. Super fast to put on and take off. The buckle in the front keeps it secure. Have saved my scooter from a lot of water and snow by buying this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: big fan of the tire clip because it's windy where i live
customer_reviews.author: DuMonde

customer_reviews.title: Rain still gets thru but not as bad as having nothing at all
customer_reviews.text: Not water-proof! Rain still gets thru but not as bad as having nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hoskinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect and keeps my moped out of the elements
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howland

customer_reviews.title: Scooter/Bicycle cover - a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover 3 bicycles and it is serving its purpose well. Keeps them dry and clean. We purchased one in the past to cover a Vespa scooter which also worked well but due to intense exposure to the sun it only lasted a few years. For the price, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly with extra on the ground!! Keeps dry and clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit big but it covers the scooter well. Material is thin but I'll see how it works on the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Gerber Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin material but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin material but does the trick to keep the rain off our vespa. For the price it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: N. T.

customer_reviews.title: Used this for our moped and works great. Lasted for over a year outdoors and replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our moped and works great. Lasted for over a year outdoors and replaced it with the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This protected my 50cc Kymco scooter well during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: JBone

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Clip helps it stay on in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Tardif

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does what its supposed to do. Protect my scooter from the elements. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: nok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect. does the job, we keep the moped outside and it keeps it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Laines3

customer_reviews.title: It was great the first year
customer_reviews.text: It was great the first year, but completely shredded due to sun exposure in second year. Don't get one if you live in Colorado
customer_reviews.author: billm

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice cover, I reallt like the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover, I reallt like the fact that it has a clip to secure it in stead of the hooks. But I wished that it had two clips instead of just the one. On windy days the one clip is prone to brake.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good product, fits great, great price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Honda Elite 80. Fits perfect. Lightweight, not bulky, waterproof tent like material.
customer_reviews.author: vear

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Its a cheap cover but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dubya

customer_reviews.title: strap comes loose and cover easily blows off scooter
customer_reviews.text: Delivered timely and covers scooters very well from rain and dust. Not fitted, strap comes loose and cover easily blows off scooter. Has to be secured with clips and/or rocks to weigh down cover. Not at all ideal to remove cover and replace cover quickly. It does the trick but is not at all custom. More like a large tarp.
customer_reviews.author: tagamc

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, low price and low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in January of 2015. The strap and buckle to affix to the wheel broke on the 2nd use. The strap separated from the cover, the buckle was intact. As of July 4th 2015 the entire cover is torn to shreds. I live in Miami and this covers my Vespa when its not in use. Maybe the Florida weather conditions are too much to handle for this cover since it basically disintegrated. I am not rough on it. Anyhow it was the cheapest cover available so I wasn't expecting great quality but 6 months of use isn't acceptable to me either. All of that being considered I still might end up buying another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: MoonBean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for our scooter. It stays secure in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Darcy

customer_reviews.title: This cover fell apart within one year. Completely disintegrated ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover fell apart within one year. Completely disintegrated in the sun. Don't purchase if you are planning on covering something outside. :(
customer_reviews.author: michelle king

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, light weight could be a little heavier
customer_reviews.author: jimbo327

customer_reviews.title: Cool cover
customer_reviews.text: keep the newest addition to the family dry... Nicely. Easy to use, easy to fold away.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Zlotkowski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this in Florida and creates too much moisture under the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Botharnatra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, this was a tight fit for my 150cc scooter with rear box.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: ... and is in use all appear to be in good working
customer_reviews.text: everything was as listed and is in use all appear to be in good working order
customer_reviews.author: Henri C.

customer_reviews.title: Would probably be better for indoor/ garage
customer_reviews.text: The clip ripped off on the second use due to high winds... Would probably be better for indoor/ garage use
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: It's not fancy at all but will serve its purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not fancy at all but will serve its purpose. My bike us parked under a tree all the time and the cover prevents me from having to clean it all the time. Note for the price you'll be keeping your bike clean which I think is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BestDeal

customer_reviews.title: ... have your bike damp but for the price it's nice
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of rain it will have your bike damp but for the price it's nice buy
customer_reviews.author: Alexander The Great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Just wish it had back straps like the front...
customer_reviews.author: lisa larson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using both to cover our bicycles. The fit is just right.
customer_reviews.author: W.D. Greve

customer_reviews.title: works great I live in florida and its rainy season now ...
customer_reviews.text: works great I live in florida and its rainy season now have been using it for about 3 weeks no rain got thru it so far
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E.

customer_reviews.title: Covers my Agility 50cc scooter well
customer_reviews.text: Covers my Agility 50cc scooter well. Condensation does build up under it and gets my seat & the underneath of the cover wet, but I just keep a rag in the seat storage to wipe it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cormier

customer_reviews.title: folds up nicely. Plastic clip is a little cheap but good ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, folds up nicely. Plastic clip is a little cheap but good enough to hold the cover on my Kymco People.
customer_reviews.author: tdidds

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my 50cc Tao Tao moped and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 50cc Tao Tao moped and it fits perfectly. It hasnt come off once and it has sustained extremely strong winds and rains
customer_reviews.author: De'Ja Echols

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike cover fits perfectly it des does what ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike cover fits perfectly it des does what it says it does. I recommend buying this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so better use larger for normal
customer_reviews.text: Does his job and protects well from the rain but the strip to hang it to the motorcycle broke as soon as I pulled a little bit on it. I have a small bike, so better use larger for normal bikes
customer_reviews.author: thomas grevesse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 2004 yamaha zuma scooter. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: josh barksdale

customer_reviews.title: size is good. Seems just a tad bit bulky in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, size is good. Seems just a tad bit bulky in the middle, but NOT a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anony-mouse

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: strap broke first week that i used the cover . Don't have time to send it back for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: steven kay

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than you'd expect for its size so probably better used for small bikes
customer_reviews.text: It seems much smaller than you'd expect for its size so probably better used for small bikes, but it keeps the water off and dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: great cover for the price. nice belt clips together in front for those windy days. so far so good. fits my small 500cc bike perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Duran

customer_reviews.title: Very good motorcycle cover
customer_reviews.text: nice cover, the size its perfect! the material cover looks strong, I just want a blue one but i recived black color
customer_reviews.author: Luis Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 150cc scooter. Stays dry. Would recommend to anyone. Delivery was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Cover fell apart in 6 months. What a pice of s***!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and gets the job done. Fits my Zuma ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and gets the job done. Fits my Zuma 50fx perfectly and keeps the dust off for under 20 bucks. What more could you ask for? I can't comment for it's actual weatherproofing as it's just covering my scoot in an underground heated garage for the winter but its more than capable of completing this task.
customer_reviews.author: Zpb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's been raining nonstop where I live and my moped (and helmet) are dry!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Honda PCX 150 with a GIVI windshield
customer_reviews.author: Jim McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size large and it fit perfect and like that it is water proof and covers very well. I have bravo sky 50. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Saffery

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a dust cover indoor setting.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done if you just want a dust cover in a garage setting. However, if you plan on using it outdoors, it wouldn't last most than 1 month. First, would say it's water resistant, not water proof. Second, two weeks of weather exposure (morning dew, night moisture, etc) destroyed the material within two weeks of daily (used as an overnight cover in California). Last, stitching started falling off after 3 days. Would I buy it again? Maybe... For the reason i doubt anyone would want to steal such a crappy cover.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

product_meta.title: Docooler Motorcycle Bike Moped Scooter Cover Waterproof Rain UV Dust Prevention Dustproof Covering (L)
product_meta.description:
This motorcycle cover is made of 180T polyester taffeta, with waterproof processing. It is lightweight and easy to carry. With a storage bag, it can be folded into it when not in use. It is really a good choice for your motorcycle.
Specifications:
Color: black & silver
Material: 180T polyester taffeta with PU coating
Cover size: L, XL (optional)
Total weight: approx. 397-445g / 14-15.7oz
Size details:
L:
Length:220cm/86.6in;Width:95cm/37.4in;Height:110cm/43.3in
XL:
Length:245cm/96.4in;Width:105cm/41.3in;Height:125cm/49.2in
Note: Please check out whether this cover is suitable for your motorcycle.
Packing list:
1 * Motorcycle cover
1 * Storage bag
feature_bullets: Protects motorcycle against rain, snow, dust and dirt, UV rays, etc.
Comes with a storage bag, can be folded into it when not in use.
Complete exterior and interior waterproof processing. (Please do not leave it soaked in deep water for a long time.)
High quality, washable, and durable to use.
With elastic bottom in the front and rear parts for fast and easy use.
